answers.answer: I think I'll deliver by next wednesday. I'll have a c section and I think she will be between 7- 7 1/2lbs and around 19in long.

Dkl- I can't wait to see if you are right but try to pick a weight like 7 6 or 712! It's just fun to see if you are right! Next wed the 10th....alittle gemni my baby is the 15th! It's a great month especially for bday's ! I love june!
After I read Dkl's post it reminded me about the length. I think he will be 22 inches long!
I think I'll deliver in the first week of July, July 6th, and my labor will be 28 hours, I think he will be 8lbs4ozs and about 23 inches long.
Okay well if I pretend that they are right exactly that she weighed 7lb 2oz on thursday.... then I'd say if she is born on Wednesday she will weigh 7lb 8oz.

I think I will go at the end of June or very beginning of July (my b-day is June 29th) so we might share a birthday, lets guess June 30th though..... I think my labor will last about 30 hours and he will weigh 8lbs 2oz and be 20 inches long.38 days till D day!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! lol
I believe I will have him July 5th and he will weigh 8lbs 7 ounces and he will be 21 inches long. Lets just hope I am wrong and he comes earlier.
I think (hope) my guy will come July 13th and be 7 15 and 20 inches long.  = )Labor will be 8 hours.  (Again, wishful thinking; but they're supposed to get shorter with each one, right?!?)

Dkl- LOLGrose- How sweet what a nice b- lated bday gift!Tasia- How cool if the baby came one day earlier. Happy 4th baby!Jenkaye- If you have a 8hr labor you are my hero!!!!!! It's possible!Thanks ladies for answering. I figured it would be cool to see the final results and to see who was the closest!I wish you all the best deliveries and just want you to know how happy I'am for you all!Hugs,AP
I think I'll deliver in the first week of July, July 1st, and my labor will be 10 hours(Hopefully lol) ,I think she will be 9 lbs and 20 inches long.Now lets watch how wrong i'am lol!

This is fun AP, but ladies put what your due date is next to your guess.I am due on the 4th of July, I think I will go the week after next, so lets say the 25th of June and I think my labor will be a c-section although I am not supposed to have one I have a feeling I will have too, not sure. If I push her out, I think it will be easier then my first so about 5 hrs...lol...we'll see..I think she will be 6.8 and 20 inches...right now she is 5 1/2-6lbs my dr said.
My due date is July 20
My due date is July 14th
My due date is July 4th!
My due date is July 13th
Well my Due date is July 31st.  I think that I will deliver on July 25th and the baby will be about 23 inches long and weigh about 8lbs.  The labor will be about 15 hours.
Im due July 27th, I think she will come July 21 and weigh 8 lbs 2 oz, 20 inches long.  I think my labor will be 10 hours.

I have a weird feeling my guy is going to be WAY early. I am due August 2nd but I think I will have him either WAY WAY early -June 23 and he will be 4 lbs 2 oz or just a couple weeks early July 18 and he will be 5 lbs 5 oz.I find out tomorrow how big he is and if I'm dialating (which I am almost positive I am)
I  forgot to add I'm a first timer so I think labour will be 18-19 hours, unless my heart acts up then it's c-section so about 45 mins LoL.

Well I delivered June 17th, 2009 by c-section. She was a whopping 10 lbs and 20 1/2inches long. I was way off on weight as were the doctors.My due date was originally July 4th, but due to gestational diabetes and mild preeclampsia she got to come early.So I am the first in the July board to have my baby and I bet mine is the biggest. We will definitely see!!!! Good luck to all you mommies that are having their babies soon. I can't wait to hear other baby stories!!

Hey girl you were way off with the weight and the delivery day! Ha! I would never have thought 10 lbs. I love the big babies though they are so cute with the chubby cheeks! I can't wait to see more stats!
I am already way off with my weight guess! 32 weeks he was 4lbs 13 oz. So Im going to say he will be a big baby! I revise to 8lbs 2 oz.
Crysi- I hope you have a nice and quick delivery!AP

Me too! The only thing saving me is with my heart conditions I get epidural asap. No waiting till I'm so many cm dialated =D YAY! So I guess it doesn't matter much if he is big cause I won't be feeling it!I just can't believe how low he is. I keep getting stabbing pains in my cervix and my hips at their lowest point are stretching and pulling apart now. I can also feel him sitting there. His kicks can't even get much past my belly button anymore... he seriously might fall out! LoL
okay so I'm due July 26th but I think she's coming on the 18th and she'll be 7lbs 8oz and 19inches long!! We'll see!

Isn't it the weirdest feeling? My lil man has been head down since 16 wks. I have not gotten a break yet but that goes with the territory. I too feel like he is going to slap me 5 soon...LOL. I wish you the best I hope you have a wonderful delivery!AP

Hello Ladies.My prediction was completely off.  My Baby girl Kaylee Rayne Read decided that she wanted to come much earlier than we had all expected.  My Baby shower was on the 14th of June, and in the middle of the shower my water broke.  My DH took me to the hospital and they tried to stop the contractions but she was just determined to come out.  She Was offically born on the 15th at 3:12 in the morning.  Weighing in at 7 pounds 3 ounce and she was twenty inches long.  My labour was 18 hours long with 2 and a half hours of pushing.  She was a month early so she was a little sick.  We had to stay in the hospital untill just yesterday, but she's doing wonderful and I'm so happy to have her with me.   Hope all is well with everyone :)*hugs*Crystal
Crystal - Oh MAN I'm so happy for you!!! Post a picture soon! :]

Crystal - Congrats! I love that your water broke during your baby shower. She just didn't want to miss out on the party! =)AP- I'm not sure what is worse, when he "punches" my cervix or when he leans in such a way that it feels like my pubic bone is going to break from the pressure.  I'm curious to see how much lower he has gotten at my u/s Wednesday.  At least it should be quick for us, I mean really they are already right there.. Dr just needs to reach up and yank em out LoL!
So I had the day, July 5th, and the inches, 21 inches, correct. But I was off on the weight I thought he would weigh 8lbs 5oz and he weighed 9 lbs 7 oz.

Tasia- You have the maternal instinct ! Cool you were right on the money with his b-day! Bigger than you thought tho! Ha with the rate I'm going Jeremy will be a toddler this lil man is loving mommy's penthouse!
Lol mommy's penthouse that's a good one, as for my maternal instincts it helps a lot that I was induced on the fourth or he would still be in there.
Ha I thought that was funny! Ya luckily your body accepted the induction! I'm really happy for you!Hugs,AP

question: Okay so a few ladies asked who they thought would go first and Grose posted a quiz you could do to see what it says about your delivery and labor it was fun! Okay lets try guessing what we think the time and around the date our delivery will be and the size of our babies and see how accurate our Mother's intuition really is.........I think I will deliver the 2nd week of July I'll say the 11th and my labor will be about 24 hrs hrs. I think he will be 9 lbs even!I want everyone to post now and come back after delivery and post the stats to see how close the before and after is!I wanted to try something fun!AP
title: I'm bored so I thought this may be fun!
